channel.title: Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Accounts
item.description: How to manage Accounts and Subaccounts. CREATE Create a new Account instance resource as a subaccount of the one used to make the request console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/accounts\/create.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Conversations
item.description: Create and manage conversations. Create console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/conversations\/create-conversation.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Lookup v1
item.description: The Lookup API provides a way to retrieve additional information about a phone number. NUMBER Performs basic phone number validation and conversion from regional formatting to E.164 (free). console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/lookup\/number.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Numbers v1
item.description: Phone Numbers API lets you search for available numbers, purchase and manage numbers. ACTIVE List all active phone numbers. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers\/incoming.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Send Message

item.title: Numbers v2 - Available
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. TYPE Search for available phone numbers by type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/available-type.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Numbers v2 - Active
item.description: The new Global Phone Numbers Catalog API lets you search for available numbers to purchase and to manage active numbers. LIST List all active phone numbers. Optionally filter by PhoneNumber, Geography, and Type (e.g. local, mobile, tollfree, shortcode.) console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/phone-numbers-v2\/active-list.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Feedback
item.description: How to send and fetch messages with the Twilio Messaging API. PROVIDE FEEDABACK Send an SMS for which to provide feedback with ProvideFeedback=true param. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/feedback\/create.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Service
item.description: How to add user verification to your web application with Twilio Verify. Create a Verification Service (once). CREATE console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/verify\/create.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Settings
item.description: Enter key/value environment variables to use in Postman API requests. Add Custom Environment Variable Environment Variables Edit Delete const newEnvVarDialog = document.getElementById("newEnvVarDialog") let keyElement = newEnvVarDialog.querySelector("[modal-data-key]") let valueElement = newEnvVarDialog.querySelector("[modal-data-value]") const keys = Object.keys(localStorage).sort(function (a, b) { return a.toLowerCase().localeCompare(b.toLowerCase()) }) let envVars = [] let envObj = {} keys.forEach((key) = { envObj = {} envObj.key = key envObj.value = localStorage[key] envVars.

item.title: Test Credentials
item.description: How to send messages with test credentials to simulate different responses. This API uses the test credentials and test phone numbers described here. SUCCESS console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/test\/success.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .

item.title: Verify
item.description: How to add user verification to your web application with Twilio Verify. Send OTP, Check OTP. SEND OTP Channel options include sms, whatsapp, call, and email. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/verify\/send.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .
